sentence.Network_en: Her cleverness seems to get in the way of her emotions.
sentence.Network_cn: 她好像聪明有余，激情不足。

sentence.Network_en: He sat back, smiling complacently at his own cleverness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他身子往后一靠，为自己的聪明得意地笑了。

sentence.Network_en: The fox is known for its cleverness and cunning.
sentence.Network_cn: 狐狸的机敏和狡猾是人所共知的.

entry.tran: 聪明的;聪颖的;智商高的
entry.def: Someone who is clever is intelligent and able to understand things easily or plan things well.

example.ex: My sister was always a lot cleverer than I was...
example.tran: 我妹妹向来比我聪明许多。

entry.def: A clever idea, book, or invention is extremely effective and shows the skill of the people involved.

example.tran: 构思巧妙、扣人心弦的小说

example.ex: A colleague of mine in Milan devised the following very clever little experiment.
example.tran: 我在米兰的一个同事设计了下面这个非常巧妙的小实验。

entry.tran: 聪明过头的;过分聪明的
entry.def: If someone is too clever by half, they are very clever and they show their cleverness in a way that annoys other people.

example.ex: His many admirers describe him as clever: his enemies as too clever by half.
example.tran: 崇拜他的人很多说他聪明;恨他的人则说他聪明过了头。

means.word_mean: 2. intelligence as manifested in being quick and witty

auth_sentence.content: But never underestimate the cleverness of a good experimentalist.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But never underestimate the cleverness of a good experimentalist.

auth_sentence.content: Weasels have a reputation for cleverness, quickness and guile.
auth_sentence.res_content: Weasels have a reputation for cleverness, quickness and guile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Weasels have a reputation for cleverness, quickness and guile.

auth_sentence.content: Beyond that, the president damages himself with his cleverness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Beyond that, the president damages himself with his cleverness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Beyond that, the president damages himself with his cleverness.

sentences.en: Your cleverness and skill has compelled our admiration.
sentences.cn: 你的聪明和技巧使我们不得不敬佩。

sentences.en: The fox is known for its cleverness and cunning.
sentences.cn: 狐狸的机敏和狡猾是人所共知的。
